title: Chapter 381 - No Way! That’S All?
body:
Chapter 381 - No Way! That’S All?

Qin Dongxu took a deep breath and said, “That’s right. Your Excellency, if you kill Su Yi for us, we’ll naturally be willing to follow you.”

Clarifying Truth pressed his palms together and nodded.

When they saw You Changkong, Qin Dongxu, and Clarifying Truth express their positions, Shang Luoyu and Lin Yubei made their positions clear.

Su Yi and Hua Xinfeng were instantly surrounded on all sides, with no allies or reinforcements.

Even Hua Xinfeng hadn’t anticipated this development. Qin Dongxu and the others had chosen to throw in their lot with Chu Xiu due to Su Yi’s presence!

Her heart was instantly heavy beyond comparison. 

She’d originally planned to take this bunch down, one by one, after seizing whatever good fortune the ruins had to offer!

So many top-class Earthly Immortals were pointing their spears at the two of them. It was easy to imagine just how heavy Hua Xinfeng’s heart was!
